messages.content:
Sure, here are three great books about REST API%3a

1. %22RESTful Web Services%22 by Leonard Richardson and Sam Ruby %2d This book provides an in%2ddepth look at RESTful web services, including principles, best practices, and implementation strategies using various programming languages and tools.

2. %22API Design Patterns%22 by Paolo Negri %2d This book covers various API design patterns and best practices for developing RESTful APIs, including topics such as resource modeling, error handling, security, and performance.

3. %22RESTful API Design%3a Best Practices in API Design with REST%22 by Mohammad Ali Babaei %2d This book focuses on best practices for designing RESTful APIs, including topics such as URI design, resource representations, data modeling, and versioning. It also covers more advanced topics such as hypermedia and HATEOAS.
